review: This does everything I need it to and more. My smart TV doesn't seem to like Netflix sometimes so with the Chromecast I can still watch without having to fight the TV. I am waiting for HBO Now to add Chromecast support and I will be even more content.

review: I found it very useful and easy to use specially with kids. I highly recommend this for parents it turned my tv into smart TV
author: Khalid almutawah

review: I now own 3 Chromecast.  I love the ability to cast using my phone and I don't miss having an interface.  No need for an extra remote or interface to bother with.  I even use the Backdrop to display family photos instead of the stock photos.  This turns it into a beautiful picture frame that is constantly cycling through my family.  I have been complemented multiple times on how great it is to display photos like that.
author: HiddenTalnt

review: It was the BEST thing ever. It was really easy to connect. I thought I would have problems with it, but no. It was perfect. Really easy to use and to connect. Everyone should have one.
author: Maria

review: A skeptic, I doubted anything so advanced could be easy to connect. It was simple. Most difficult part was getting behind the TV and finding the HDMI port. I am still amazed, but my granddaughter doesn`t care as long as she can watch Thomas the Tank Engine and The Wiggled.
author: AL

review: My Chromecast is the primary means to display content on my TV as it is simple and you rarely have to touch the TV remote, your smartphone is your remote. Queue up YouTube videos, cast your music, podcasts, Disney Movies Anywere, etc.  Chromecast is crossplatform: Android, iOS, and desktop/laptops can cast to it. Chromecast will even tell you TV to turn on and switch to the correct input.  Just make sure you plug the Chromecast into the wall for power and not a TV USB port. At this price, everyone should get one.
author: Phillip S.

review: We use this all the time to cast images, movies, videos, or screen shots to our flat panel TV. We love it, and have recommended it to all our friends.
author: Daniel Garvin
